body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos, the premier car dealership. My name is Christopher Washington. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Christopher. My name is Kathleen Edwards. I'm looking into purchasing a new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Kathleen. Let's find the perfect car for you. May I ask for your phone number so we can keep in touch about the car options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. And could I also have your email address to send you some information about our current offers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly. It's kath.edwards at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I'll make sure to send you some exciting deals. Is there a particular type of car or feature you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in a sedan with excellent fuel efficiency. Also, it would be great if it has advanced safety features.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, I have a few models in mind that fit that description. I'll compile the options and send them your way shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kathleen, and feel free to reach out if you have any other questions. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Christopher. I appreciate your help. Goodbye!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Christopher Washington and the customer's name is Kathleen Edwards.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
